name: authentication-peer
description: Information about a peer device in the authentication infrastructure, including its network location and capabilities.

fields.name: host
fields.description: The network host address and port of the peer device.

fields.name: device
fields.description: The device identifier of the peer.

fields.name: auth-aware
fields.description: Indicates whether the peer is authentication-aware.

fields.name: router
fields.description: Indicates whether the peer functions as a router.

fields.name: hub
fields.description: Indicates whether the peer functions as a hub.
